/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a tranquil scene of a street in Beijing, China. The street, bathed in the soft glow of daylight, is flanked by lush green trees and bushes, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. Nestled amidst this verdant landscape is a serene lake, its calm waters reflecting the clear blue sky above. The sun shines brightly, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm, inviting light. The perspective of the image is from a low angle, looking up towards the towering trees and the expansive sky, creating a sense of depth and scale. The colors in the image are vibrant and natural, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. This image truly captures the essence of a peaceful day in Beijing.
